basic_information.industry: Workplace Safety Technology / Risk Management Software

headquarters.address: 280-286 SHERIDAN STREET, CAIRNS NORTH, QLD 4870, Australia

business_description.elevator_pitch: Forwood Safety is a leading global provider of AI-driven workplace safety and risk management solutions, dedicated to eliminating fatalities, serious injuries, and catastrophic events from high-risk industries through innovative SaaS technology.
business_description.core_business: Development and deployment of Critical Risk Management (CRM+) software platform - an AI-driven SaaS solution for fatality prevention and workplace safety management
business_description.value_proposition: The most comprehensive and advanced fatality and serious injury risk management solution on the market, with proven track record of maintaining zero fatalities across 800+ implementation sites
business_description.target_market: High-risk industries including mining, construction, energy, oil & gas, and manufacturing companies globally, with particular focus on large enterprises and multinational corporations
business_description.mission_statement: Mission Zero - to eliminate fatalities, serious injuries and catastrophic events from workplaces, one organisation at a time

founders.name: Steve Wood
founders.background: Former mine site worker who lost three fingers in a workplace accident in 1981, dedicating his life to workplace safety and fatality elimination

founding_story.founding_motivation: Personal experience with workplace injury - Steve Wood's hand was caught in machinery on a mine site in 1981, losing three fingers but surviving what could have been fatal. This traumatic experience transformed into a lifelong mission to prevent workplace injuries and protect workers globally.
founding_story.evolution: Grew from a small business to a cutting-edge technology company supported by strong consulting and coaching division over 30 years

business_model.revenue_model: SaaS subscription platform with consulting and coaching services

primary_products.name: Forwood CRM+ (Critical Risk Management)
primary_products.description: End-to-end AI-driven fatality prevention SaaS solution that strengthens critical controls and risk management culture
primary_products.target_industries: Mining, Construction, Energy, Manufacturing, Oil & Gas

primary_products.name: Tailings+ Platform
primary_products.description: Specialized platform to accelerate tailings facilities audits to be 100% compliant with global standards

primary_products.name: AI Video Analytics
primary_products.description: Computer vision and AI technology to monitor safe behaviors and workplace conditions in real-time

primary_products.name: ESG Compliance Software
primary_products.description: Software solutions to help companies comply with Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) frameworks

industry_analysis.primary_market: Workplace Safety Technology and Risk Management Software
industry_analysis.broader_market: Industrial IoT and AI-powered Safety Solutions

industry_analysis.market_position: Recognized leader in critical risk management with proven zero-fatality track record
industry_analysis.growth_trajectory: Expanding globally with 60% of Australian mines preparing to adopt AI safety solutions by 2025

Founder's personal experience drives authentic mission
Strong endorsements from major mining companies (BHP, Rio Tinto, Newmont)
competitive_landscape.market_differentiation: Only solution with documented zero-fatality record across all deployment sites since full implementation

key_findings: FORWOOD ENTERPRISES PTY LTD operates as Forwood Safety, a globally recognized leader in AI-driven workplace safety technology
Founded in 1995 by Steve Wood after personal workplace injury, driving authentic mission to eliminate workplace fatalities
Proven track record: zero workplace fatalities across 800+ fully deployed sites globally
Strong venture capital backing from Macquarie Capital and Centerstone Capital supporting global expansion
Advanced AI technology stack with React/Remix frontend and NestJS/AWS backend infrastructure
Active recruitment for AI Co-Pilot Full Stack Developer role indicates technology team expansion
Global presence across 1000+ sites in 60 countries with focus on high-risk industries
UN Global Compact participant demonstrating sustainability and corporate responsibility commitment
strategic_insights: Company positioned at forefront of Australian mining AI adoption wave with 60% of mines preparing for AI implementation by 2025
Founder's personal story provides authentic competitive moat and strong cultural foundation
Zero-fatality track record creates powerful market differentiation and customer confidence
Venture capital investment enables aggressive expansion into new markets and product development
AI-first development culture positions company for rapid technology advancement
Strong endorsements from major mining companies (BHP, Rio Tinto, Newmont) provide market validation
Global deployment experience reduces expansion risk and accelerates international growth
market_opportunities: Australian mining sector AI adoption acceleration creating immediate growth opportunity
Global expansion potential leveraging existing 60-country presence
ESG compliance software market growing due to increasing regulatory requirements
Video analytics and computer vision applications in workplace safety expanding rapidly
Cross-industry expansion beyond mining into construction, manufacturing, and energy sectors
risk_factors: Dependence on founder's personal story and leadership may create succession planning challenges
High-risk industry focus may limit market size compared to broader software markets
Regulatory changes in workplace safety requirements could impact product demand
Competition from larger technology companies entering AI safety market
Customer concentration in mining industry creates cyclical business risk

confidence_assessment.recommendation: High confidence for strategic analysis, investment evaluation, and business intelligence purposes. Strong data validation across multiple authoritative sources with particular strength in Australian business registry and corporate intelligence.
